welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Montataire, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to discover all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
